Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She attempts to calibrate the audio-visual module but still has a hard time sensing her surroundings.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Vale... ria...'}
{3: 'The sounds reach her ears as if filtered through layers of ocean water, while her vision remains a blur of light...'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Where... am I?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The ruins next to the school building. The Punishing is in low concentration here.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Just as Shiva begins to relax, a shadow flashes across her rippling, distorted vision.'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Valeria, look out!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0.4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0.4', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0.4', 4: '5'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory977.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.9', 5: '0'}
{3: 'The moment she speaks, the world before her begins to spin violently.'}
{3: 'Following that is the distinctive bang of a pulse gun.'}
{3: 'As her mind fully clears, she realizes Valeria is supporting her through a series of rapid advances and dodges.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0.4', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0.4', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Mmph!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_08.jpg', 3: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Such remarkable reflexes and physical prowess...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{3: 'Sharp applause rings out from nearby as a woman of elegant bearing emerges from the shadows.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Reika Saotome...'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'They say the average reaction time for a normal adult is around 300 milliseconds.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Trained professionals can cut that time in half.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'In track and field events, reaction times under 100 milliseconds are considered a false start.'}
{3: 'Despite the dark gun barrel trained on her, Reika speaks casually as she strolls.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Va... leria. Based on what your team members have said, you must be human, correct?'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Such extraordinary reflexes and physical capabilities are quite rare for a human.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "According to records, you're now a Construct, though you look exactly the same as when you were human."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I've already removed all those unnecessary encapsulation lines and unsightly modification traces..."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Though I've had to sacrifice my frame's combat capabilities in the process."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I have OCD. I can't think like a human unless every detail of my body perfectly replicates human form."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Through modular customization, I've made both my face and figure as human-like as possible."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "You're smart enough to understand what I mean. I don't care what you look like, I want to know why you came back."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Then you should also know that you're in no position to threaten me right now."}
{3: "Reika casts a meaningful glance toward Valeria's side, where Discord clutches her head in pain."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "If you don't retreat now, Yuka's interference will only grow stronger."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'And yet here you are, completely unscathed.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Just a small privilege, hardly worth mentioning.'}
{3: "A gentle yet distant smile remains fixed on Reika's face, causing Valeria to unconsciously tighten her grip on her gun."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Of course, I can answer your earlier question about why I've come back."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The reason is simple—Yuka has awakened.'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The initial Construct surgery on her was unsuccessful and she required an external power supply system. Even after she was turned into a Construct, her body structure remained exceptionally fragile.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'After the Punishing outbreak, my assistant took it upon himself to sever most of her power conduits, forcing her into a low-power hibernation state.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Many modules in her body were damaged as a result... Even with today's technology, her condition remains virtually indistinguishable from death."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Fundamentally, the damage wasn't limited to just the regular modules, but also her... M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "For decades, I've tried everything to wake Yuka up. Orthodox methods, unconventional approaches—nothing I tried ever worked."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{3: 'As if sharing its rage at this cruel reality, the ground begins to violently shake once more.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "The school building is starting to tremble as well. It seems... the Red Tide isn't far from here!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "And yet, she fixed something that I couldn't fix for decades, using the power of the Punishing, and even the Red Tide...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, she backs away, her figure melding with the darkness in the corner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'What price... has that child taken upon herself this time?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her expression is hidden in the shadows, but Valeria can hear the sorrow in her voice.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Where... are you going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm going to see my daughter... one last time.", 4: '18'}
{3: "Reika's voice grows fainter until it fades away, and that's when Valeria knows she's gone."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Why... didn't you shoot? Wasn't she... the mission target?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'We can talk about "mission targets" after your and Discord\'s M.I.N.D. stabilizes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Discord turns to look and notices beads of sweat continuously forming on Valeria's face..."}
{3: 'To stabilize both of their M.I.N.D.s, she is overloading her Mind Beacon output.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Well then, Yata.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'You must have heard our conversation.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a burst of static, a soft sigh comes through from the other end of the terminal.'}
{3: 'Valeria closes her eyes wearily.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "It seems that while the exact reason for Yuka's awakening remains unclear, we can largely credit it to Cradle and the Red Tide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you have time for small talk, shouldn't you be more concerned about your squad members?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hmph, the rescue transport drones were already en route the moment we lost contact with the Scarabs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Sending more people would have only led to pointless casualties because of that bizarre "consciousness projection." We can only place our hopes in the Scarabs now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola narrows his eyes, irritably scanning through the real-time mission briefings.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'More than that, what intrigues me is how this consciousness projection can control everyone like puppets on strings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It\'s simple. What we call consciousness projection isn\'t real "projection" at all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "As you should know, consciousness connection is essentially achieved when a commandant's beacon connects to a Construct's M.I.N.D., which helps to stabilize the Construct's consciousness.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Consciousness projection, being a derivative technology, operates on the same principle.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without pausing his typing on the virtual keyboard, Asimov lets out a barely audible sigh.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You should elaborate on that.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In other words, while it still involves connecting someone else's beacon to one's M.I.N.D., consciousness projection allows multiple Mind Beacons to connect simultaneously.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This so-called "projection" is nothing more than creating illusions within one\'s own M.I.N.D. to simulate the effect of controlling others.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If it could actually manipulate people, people would have talked about it more, wouldn't they?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola tosses the mission brief aside and massages his temples.'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Sharp observation. Having multiple beacons connect to a M.I.N.D. simultaneously is already an enormous burden. Attempting to transmit information on top of that, let alone creating illusions to control others, is an extremely dangerous operation.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Connection was never meant to trap people in illusions... Consciousness projection, as its derivative, causes severe destabilization of the M.I.N.D. model even when creating an illusion for just one person.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Which means the Yuka we know...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Has transcended human limitations, both physically and mentally. Maintaining such a state constantly inflicts tremendous pain on her M.I.N.D.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The extreme demands on test subjects and the ease of inflicting fatal M.I.N.D. trauma... This is why consciousness projection deserves nothing more than to be lost to history.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Yet as a derivative of consciousness connection, its targets aren't limited to humans—it even affects Constructs and mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "This must be the Red Tide's influence. The Punishing has never been picky about what it corrupts.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Of course... Rather than the Red Tide granting Yuka power, it's more accurate to say...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov takes a deep breath, then slowly delivers his conclusion.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Yuka has become a signal amplifier for the Red Tide.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'A well-mannered child you are.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "I shouldn't have stopped, and you shouldn't be here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "All six hands unconsciously clench into fists as Yata's expression grows increasingly fierce."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "After everything that's happened, what right do you have to see Yuka?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Because I am her mother.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her face maintains a polite smile, but her voice is utterly devoid of emotion.'}
{3: 'Yata turns these horrifying words over in her mind twice, and then...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "A deafening crash echoes through the dilapidated school building as dust clouds fill Reika's vision."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab'}
{3: 'As the dust settles, Reika sees that Yata has punched a hole in the wall behind her, and is now glaring at her with undisguised fury.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yes, some mother you are.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika remains unmoved by Yata's threat and responds with the same steady smile."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Cut the act! When have you ever seen her as your daughter?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Have you ever, for even a moment, felt her pain—all of it—both from her past and now as she's being corrupted by the Red Tide?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Sacrificing your own daughter for scientific research. Is this what you call being a "mother"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though she tries to contain her anger, her voice grows louder and louder until it becomes a frenzied roar.'}
{3: 'Reika closes her eyes briefly before opening them again with a resigned look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Indeed, she's not my daughter. She's nothing but a test subject.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Isn't it natural for any researcher to be eager to know the current state of their test subject?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Then get the hell out of here! You have no right to—ugh!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory970.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.1', 5: '0.4'}
{3: "After her ears start ringing, needle-like pain surges through Yata's M.I.N.D., nearly knocking her out cold again."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Damn it, Yuka!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Yata struggles against the hallucinations, she feels something cool touch her wrist.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory970.jpg', 3: '0.1', 4: '0', 5: '0.4'}
{3: 'The pain in her M.I.N.D. ebbs away like a receding tide. Looking down, she finds a black metal band around her wrist.'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "This jamming device is from our old experiments. It can't completely block interference now that the Red Tide is more powerful, but it helps reduce the intensity nonetheless.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What about you?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata glances at Reika's wrist, but finds nothing there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I don't need that anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Without a jamming device or a Mind Beacon to stabilize your M.I.N.D., you'll be infected in no time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata tries to push the jamming device back into Reika's hand, but Reika calmly refuses it."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "It's not like this is the only one of its kind. I still have one on me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I just don't need to wear it anymore.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata takes a step back, yet keeps her vigilant glare fixed on Reika.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Pardon my frankness, but I still can't trust you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "This thing can't make up for even a fraction of what Yuka had to endure...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: '...I never expected it to do anything for Yuka.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika briefly turns her face away as her distant smile gradually fades.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Let me make one thing clear—if you insist on calling me a researcher, then know that no one understands my subject better than I do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let me see her, whether as a researcher or, even if you won't acknowledge it, as a mother.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "This won't do you any harm.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '...Don\'t you dare use that word "mother" in front of me again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata enunciates each word with cold deliberation.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You schemed to transform yourself into a Construct and waited all this time for Yuka to wake up... just to see her once more?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The brevity of the response leaves Yata stunned.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Listen to me, Yata.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "That child's M.I.N.D. is flooded with countless memories of others, threatening to drown out her own consciousness.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Drowning out... herself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Ironic, isn't it? This was the inevitable outcome of the consciousness projection experiment, even if it wasn't what we had hoped for.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The so-called consciousness projection isn\'t about projecting one\'s consciousness onto others, but rather having others "project" into oneself, ultimately exerting influence within one\'s own M.I.N.D...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You knew this would happen all along, yet you still made her go through with it!', 4: '1'}
{3: "A barely perceptible flash of pain crosses Reika's eyes."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let's just leave it at that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka is now wielding the power of the Red Tide... I'm not afraid to tell you this, Yata.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I couldn't care less whether people live or die. That's just who I am.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "If Yuka could truly find happiness within the Red Tide, I wouldn't stand in her way. I'd even feel at peace with that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "But in reality, that's absolutely impossible.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She tilts her head back slightly, letting the cold moonlight caress her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "The Red Tide has dissolved countless victims, and the number of memories Yuka now bears isn't even on the same scale.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Whether it's the Punishing infection or the pressure of people's memories, either will eventually lead to the annihilation of Yuka's consciousness.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Even now, she's being twisted by the Red Tide's will, enduring tremendous pain with each projection.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Yata closes her eyes as scenes of her encounters with Yuka flash through her mind...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1057.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1066.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_02.jpg'}
{3: "Fragile, obsessive, and mad—they're all undeniably Yuka. And yet..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1061.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "She once desperately pushed me away from danger, but now... she's trying to lure me into death."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1067.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Just as Reika said, Yuka's will has been twisted by the Red Tide."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "She knew these all along, but just couldn't bring herself to face them..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: '...Why are you telling me all this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'To free you... from your hesitation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Stop her. Free her from this endless suffering.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Stop her... but if we sever her connection to the Red Tide, will she even survive?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They both fall silent, and in this moment frozen in time, only the shadows of trees sway silently.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The Lady of the Red Tide did grant her the ability to live again, but was she truly being benevolent?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka possesses the power of projection. I fear that's the real reason she was chosen.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Her consciousness is gradually fading away, until she becomes nothing but a mere tool... a will-less amplifier...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'By then, she will have truly died.', 4: '2'}
{3: "A tinge of melancholy seeps into Reika's smile."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Go on, Yata.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'If we hurry...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'We can still see her one last time.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Yata's fists clench involuntarily once more, then slowly unfurl, the gesture holding no meaning."}
{3: 'She straps the jamming device to her wrist and rushes to where Yuka is.'}
{3: "As Yata's figure disappears from view, Reika slumps wearily against the wall."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "So this... is the pain you've been feeling...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Keeping you alive like this... it was nothing but selfishness.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A wry, self-deprecating smile plays across her lips as she slowly follows the path Yata took.'}
